description: This table containers a list of lines for rich text comments for culture isolates on the result from the RSLT_RTF_CMT_STG table.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for a culture isolate on the result from the RES_MICRO_CULTURE table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple rich text comments for a culture isolate on the result from the RSLT_RTF_CMT_STG table.

columns.name: COMMENT_GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of a group of rich text comments for a culture isolate on the result from the RSLT_RTF_CMT_STG table.
